Forretress (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0204: Pineco
Pokémon
#0206: Dunsparce →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Forretress (TCG Pocket).

Forretress has been featured on 20 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Discovery expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Forretress cards are normally Metal-type or Grass-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Forretress

Forretress
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
